function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Using online forms and surveys may limit the reach to potential participants who do not have internet access.","Impact":"Potential exclusion of individuals without internet access, leading to a biased sample.","Mitigation":"Include alternative methods of data collection, such as phone interviews or paper surveys, to reach a more diverse participant pool.","Technologies":"Phone interviews, paper surveys","People":"Individuals without internet access","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Sending emails to neighborhood associations and town councils may raise privacy concerns and increase the risk of data breaches.","Impact":"Potential exposure of personal data through email communication, leading to privacy violations and data breaches.","Mitigation":"Ensure compliance with data protection regulations, use encrypted communication channels, and obtain consent from recipients before sending the emails.","Technologies":"Encryption software, data protection protocols","People":"Recipients of the emails","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"The non-probabilistic sample for convenience may introduce bias in the study results and limit the generalizability of findings.","Impact":"Reduced accuracy and reliability of study results, leading to limited applicability of findings to the broader population.","Mitigation":"Consider random sampling methods and address biases in the analysis phase to improve the representativeness of the findings.","Technologies":"Random sampling tools, statistical analysis software","People":"Research participants","Owner":"Research team"}]}
